title: J.K. Rowling - Complete Works - Harry Potter 1 to 7 - Beedle the
description:
J.K. Rowling - Complete Works - PDF and RTF

1. James Potter Prequel Postcard
2. Harry Potter Series 1-7 Boxed Set
	ISBN-10: 0545044251
	ISBN-13: 978-0545044257
3. Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
	ISBN-10: 0439321603
4. Quidditch Through the Ages
	ISBN-10: 0439321603
5. The Tales of Beedle the Bard (British)
	ISBN-13: 9780747599876

Special Christmas 2008 release.

This torrent replaces and adds to two previous releases:-
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4304296/Harry_Potter_1-7_Reference_Quality_eBook_Collection
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4318124/Harry_Potter_Prequel_Postcard
Check the earlier comments to be assured these are the best available.
Some very slight corrections have been made to earlier files.
PDF's are now un-encrypted.
RTF's have been compressed to save space and retain summary information that may be lost in file copy.

When viewing in Adobe Reader:-
To make sure you are seeing the books exactly as the original please check...
View -> Page Display-> Two-Up and Show Cover Page During Two-Up are ticked
or have a look at the READER SETTINGS.JPG graphic.

The RTF's are exactly the same text as the PDF's with inverted comma's having spaces between so - " ' and ' " and ellipsis replacing spaced full stops. Graphics have been replaced with the corresponding text.
Use these files to make your own ebook versions (LIT, PDB, LRF, etc.)
NOTE:- Fantastic and Quidditch are NOT duplicated to RTF because of the written comments and footnotes, see the PDF's.
Beedle the Bard has been rearranged to place the footnotes directly under the paragraph they pertain to.

So feel free to pass electronic copies along, just make sure you OWN paper copies yourself.

Scanned in the dark by BeB for everyone who has purchased the book and laments the lack of any eBook releases by the Author.
